mapper.update:
update APPL_PAY
EXP_PAY_AMT = #{expPayAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAY_TYPE_CODE = #{payTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_AMT = #{payAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAY_DATE = #{payDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_STS_CODE = #{payStsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LGD_OID = #{lgdOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LGD_TID = #{lgdTid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRE_ID = #{creId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRE_DATE = #{creDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MOD_ID = #{modId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOD_DATE = #{modDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where APPL_NO = #{applNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and PAY_SEQ = #{paySeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update APPL_PAY set EXP_PAY_AMT = #{expPayAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAY_TYPE_CODE = #{payTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_AMT = #{payAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAY_DATE = #{payDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_STS_CODE = #{payStsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LGD_OID = #{lgdOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LGD_TID = #{lgdTid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRE_ID = #{creId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRE_DATE = #{creDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MOD_ID = #{modId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOD_DATE = #{modDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where APPL_NO = #{applNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and PAY_SEQ = #{paySeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT A.APPL_NO, B.ADMS_FEE, C.PAY_SEQ FROM APPL A LEFT OUTER JOIN APPL_PAY C ON A.APPL_NO = C.APPL_NO AND C.PAY_STS_CODE = '00001', ADMS_CORS B WHERE A.ADMS_NO = B.ADMS_NO AND A.DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE AND IFNULL(A.ARI_INST_CODE,'') = IFNULL(B.ARI_INST_CODE,'') AND A.CORS_TYPE_CODE = B.CORS_TYPE_CODE AND A.APPL_NO = #{applNo,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT A.APPL_NO, A.APPL_STS_CODE, B.ADMS_FEE, C.LGD_FINANCENAME, C.LGD_ACCOUNTNUM FROM APPL A, APPL_PAY_CS B LEFT OUTER JOIN XPAY_PAY_RSLT C ON B.LGD_TID = C.LGD_TID WHERE A.APPL_NO = B.APPL_NO AND A.APPL_NO = #{applNo,jdbcType=INTEGER};
